shortBio: Specialized legal services with a focus on Intellectual Property and Patent Law. 20+ years of dynamic practice dedicated to protecting innovation and client rights.
aboutText:
After graduating from Law School and obtaining my Master of Laws (LL.M.) specialized in Patent Law and Intellectual Property, I have dedicated the past two decades to providing high-level legal counsel in Athens.

Our firm combines modern expertise with a personal touch, offering solutions in trademarks, patents, corporate law, and civil litigation. I believe in a strategic approach to every case, ensuring that my clients' creativity and entrepreneurship are fully protected in an ever-evolving legal landscape.
